seo.title: Monarch - Luxury Concierge
seo.description: Monarch, your luxury concierge for exceptional experiences. Villas, yachts, private jets and bespoke services.
seo.keywords: luxury concierge, exceptional villas, private yachts, private jets, limousines, butler services
seo.ogDescription: Discover excellence with Monarch, your luxury concierge

destinations.title: Exceptional Destinations
destinations.subtitle: Explore our exclusive destinations where luxury and refinement meet to create unforgettable experiences

destinations.title: Exclusive Destinations
destinations.subtitle: Discover our luxury destinations where every detail is orchestrated to create unforgettable experiences
destinations.servicesDescription: An exclusive selection of luxury services to create your perfect experience

cta.title: Let's Create Your Experience
cta.description: Our team of expert concierges accompanies you in creating bespoke experiences

marbella.description: Mediterranean paradise where Spanish luxury meets glamour

paris.description: Capital of elegance where art, gastronomy and luxury are sublimated

cannes.description: Cinema capital where prestige and glamour rival the Mediterranean

saint_tropez.name: Saint-Tropez
saint_tropez.description: Legendary village where Provençal tradition meets international jet-set

fab.message: Hello! I'm interested in Monarch's luxury concierge services. I'd like to learn more about your exclusive experiences.

philosophy.title: Beyond Expectations
philosophy.subtitle: We don't just fulfill dreams—we craft experiences that transcend imagination.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We constantly push boundaries, pioneering new ways to create extraordinary moments that have never been experienced before.

legacy.title: Legacy
legacy.description: Every experience we create becomes part of your personal story, a treasured memory that lasts forever.

philosophy.quote: Luxury is not about owning the finest things—it's about experiencing the impossible moments that define who you become.

process.title: The Monarch Way
process.subtitle: Our signature approach to creating extraordinary experiences

listen.title: Listen
listen.description: We begin by understanding your vision, desires, and the emotions you want to feel.
listen.detail1: In-depth consultation to understand your desires
listen.detail2: Emotional mapping of your perfect experience

design.title: Design
design.description: Our team crafts a bespoke experience tailored to your exact specifications and beyond.
design.detail1: Custom itinerary creation with luxury partners

orchestrate.title: Orchestrate
orchestrate.description: Every detail is meticulously coordinated to ensure flawless execution.

perfect.title: Perfect
perfect.description: We refine and elevate every element until it exceeds your highest expectations.

numbers.title: Excellence in Numbers
numbers.subtitle: The metrics that define our commitment to extraordinary experiences

achievement.title: Global Recognition
achievement.description: Our commitment to excellence has earned the trust of discerning clients across six continents, establishing Monarch as the definitive luxury concierge service worldwide.

cta.title: Ready for the Extraordinary?
cta.subtitle: Let our expert concierges craft your next unforgettable experience. From private jets to exclusive venues, we orchestrate the impossible.

brand.title: Luxury Redefined
brand.description: We create bespoke experiences that transcend the ordinary, crafting moments that become treasured memories for life.
